name: WHERE DID THEY GET GUNS SO BIG
name_original: WHERE DID THEY GET GUNS SO BIG
description:
Those darn black holes are threatening the Earth with guns! And it is up to you, the Moon to build your defense of satellites (who also have guns), and keep the Earth safe!

_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-

This is a game made for the Nexus Game Jam II. This is the first game I made for a game jam.

_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-
